title: Double backward functionality within dataParallel is incomplete
body_html:
the gradient penalty, for example, like L85-92 in this code, cannot be backward when using dataparallel.

The error I received is the same as reported here, more specifically:
RuntimeError: Scatter is not differentiable twice

Thank you!

body:
the gradient penalty, for example, like L85-92 in this [code](https://github.com/jfsantos/dragan-pytorch/blob/master/dragan.py ), cannot be backward when using dataparallel. 

The error I received is the same as reported [here](https://discuss.pytorch.org/t/about-doing-double-backward-within-dataparallel/4596), more specifically:
`RuntimeError: Scatter is not differentiable twice`

Thank you!
